WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS
Replenish provisions at the Guild Barracks!
Collect items found during Chocobo Expedition!

When contacting Support, this code will be necessary as proof that you are the owner of this data.
Please keep this information somewhere safe and accessible other than on your device.

Please inquire below.
Tap the corresponding button to open the inquiry box.

User support inquiries for this application can be made at gumi Inc. In order for us to provide user support, we collect, process and use users' personal data. There are times when we contract with and disclose such personal data to our wholly owned subsidiaries and our third-party service providers for assistance with this purpose. The handling of such personal data is carried out solely for this purpose in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By clicking on this URL and submitting through this online form an inquiry, you are consenting to such collection, processing, and use of your personal data and agreeing to be bound by our company’s Privacy Policy, a copy of which can be found here:
I changed models. / My game data has been erased.
I purchased Visiore, but it is not displayed/has not been received.
The game won't start, The map doesn't display, etc.
For any requests or opinions regarding the game.

Once you have submitted an inquiry, you will receive an automatic reply acknowledging its reception. Please check to ensure that your e-mail settings allow you to receive messages from the domain [@gu3.co.jp].
*Depending on your e-mail software, the reply may be sorted into your spam folder.

The following information will be referenced in the e-mail.
-Player ID
-App Version
-DLC Version
-Player Name
-Device Used
-OS Version Used

Contact Hours
10:00 a.m.–6:00 p.m. (Mon–Fri)

Regarding Inquiries
-It may take time for a response to be sent, and depending on the nature of your question, it may not be possible for us to respond to your inquiry.
*The support window is unavailable during weekends, holidays, and company closures, and replies will be sent out on the following business day.
-We will receive/respond to your inquiry via e-mail.
-Regarding bugs and other inquiries that are already mentioned in our notices or on the official website, please understand that we may answer your question via public announcement.
-We will not respond to inquiries regarding game walkthroughs or strategies.
-As a general rule, we do not respond to opinions or requests about the game, but your input will be taken into consideration as reference for future developments.
-Responses to inquiries will be handled by gumi Inc.
-Please visit the following site for more information regarding gumi Inc.'s Privacy Policy.
https://gu3.co.jp/policy/
Inquiries [WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS] [{0}]

Please enter
→



{0}-----There is no need to edit the following----

-Player ID: {0}
-App Version: {1}
-DLC_Version: {2}
-Player Name: {3}
-Model Used: {4}
-OS Version Used: {5}

*Please be aware that as a general rule, we do not reply to the contents of the actual form. However, depending on the contents, there may be cases where we do reply.
*Please note that in some cases, the information we receive may be sent out as notices, posted on the official website, etc.
*Please be aware that as a general rule, we do not respond to the contents of opinions or requests.

■Confirmed Violation Details
→

■Target Player Name
→

■Date and time violation was confirmed
→

{0}*If you have screenshots that can be used to confirm the situation, please attach it to the e-mail.
*Please note that we do not respond individually to reports of violations or share investigation results.
*We will not become involved in disputes between customers.
-----No editing required below-----
Please enter your Player ID and your set Transfer Password

-Performing a data transfer will allow you to play with the same data over several devices, or after purchasing a new device.
-Purchased and Free Visiore cannot be transferred between devices operating on different platforms. If your new devices is on the same platform, then transfer is possible. (Normal Visiore can be transferred between any platform)
-If the device you perform a data transfer onto already has [WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS] installed,
please be aware that the data transfer will overwrite and delete any player data already on the device.
The player data from several accounts on different devices cannot be consolidated into a single account.
-All optional settings will be reset to default.
-If game data is found to have been in violation of the rules, your account may be frozen or terminated.

*If you choose to sell or trade your device, please take the following steps after performing a data transfer to ensure your backup data does not remain on the old device.

[How to remove backup data]
Once you have confirmed the data has been transferred to the new device successfully, on the old device, please tap "remove account" on the title screen, or under data backup on the in-game menu.
Once your account has been removed, please delete [WAR OF THE VISIONS FINAL FANTASY BRAVE EXVIUS]
from the old device.

All DLC data will be deleted.
If deleted, DLC data will need to be downloaded again upon resuming play. Do you wish to proceed?
*The camera will rotate automatically when it becomes the turn of a unit who is hidden behind an obstacle.
*When set to ON, a mark will be displayed on recommended Abilities when selecting an Ability during manual play.
*Turning this on will stop repeats when scenes occur.

*Restores NRG automatically when NRG runs out during repeats.
*NRG will only be restored with NRG Restores.
*NRG Restores will be consumed starting from the largest restoration amount.
